scripts.generate:frontend-api: npm run generate:openapi && npm run copy:openapi && cd frontend && pnpm run generate-api
scripts.dev:frontend: npm run copy:openapi && cd frontend && pnpm run dev
scripts.build:frontend: npm run generate:frontend-api && cd frontend && pnpm run build
scripts.deploy:backend: npm run generate:openapi && cd backend && sam build && sam deploy
